title: You took away Mundo's and Trundle's auto enhancement on turrets
body:
You did this because they were already good at splitpushing and didn't need the extra help. 

Do the same to Camille, she is already good at splitpushing and doesn't need the extra help.

replies.body: Good at split pushing in what way, exactly? She's good at 1v1ing people, for sure. But taking towers?
That's a tough sell. Jax has a massive AS steroid on his passive.
With her constant aa resets and easy sheen procs its gonna be a close call for sure.
But Jax has 1000% more "womp" sounds than her when taking a turret so...
SFX op.

The three greatest sounds in League of Legends

- {{champion:157}}  dying
- The whoosh of the enemy nexus when you win. 
- Jax hitting a tower
4th is jhin shooting his 4th shot
5th is the sound of darius's voiceover after being banned.

6th is he hexakill announcement 
and 6.66th is teemos laugh
{{champion:99}} Ctrl + 4 _Intensifies_

* The sound of a Triple barrel combo into a Cannon Barrage :P

http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/4/43/Gangplank.R4.ogg/revision/latest?cb=20150803063443

Once we get Training Mode, this'd actually be trivial to set-up and test.

Even now it's possible, but it'd take about an hour or two of effort to set it up. I think it'd depend largely on their builds, and whether they optimized for splitting or for full effectiveness.
You're joking right? You do know what her Q is right? The only way you couldn't have good split pushing power on Camille at the moment is if you built pure ability power items
Just build lich bane and watch as her Q doubles it and converts it to true damage just like Triforce. And then the tower falls in 2 hits.

Lich Bane, Nashor's, and maybe Guinsoo's, Rabadon, and Gunblade?

So around 340 bonus damage from the Lich procc, 40-ish from Nashor's, base auto damage, base Q damage, potentially doubled if you get Guinsoo's timed right.

Oh, and her auto damage would get converted to - what is it, 40% AP? - against towers since her AP is so much higher than her AD. So, her base auto damage would actually be around 200 to towers.

That would end up being like, 7-800 damage to towers? Up to around 1400 with Guinsoo's double on-hit effect? With 30% cdr. 

I want to try this now.
I play Jax here. He's the fastest tower taker in the game, no fucking way camille is faster. No fucking way.
How is Jax in the current meta? I've always enjoyed playing him, but I stopped after the ADCs went top and haven't picked him up again.

Toplane adcs are gone pretty much

He's good in low elo people people auto his dodge, not as much in highelo

Godly splitpushing with any hydra. He destroys a tower in like 10 seconds midgame.
Ravenous is good for wave clear and sustain, but Titanic gives you an auto-attack reset, which seems a bit more useful for tower smashing.
I don't grab RH most of the time because it's defensive values are mehish.
Umm triforce and attack speed. She takes towers pretty quick

shes quick sure but not the fastest at all, and the OP is comparing 2 mostly tanks that had a massive damage increase on towers to a champ that builds mainly damage oriented items in the first half of the game. if she build what trundle or mundo had during the early and destroyed towers that easy, it would be evident they were a lot better at taking them.
oh for sure. the fasted tower taker is a full built ziggs. but that being said she does take them pretty fast. I dont see what the complaint is to be honest.

not even, tristana takes the crown, or a veigar with lichbane and enough stacks (good on a team with low tower taking like Vayne ADC) can easily beat ziggs.

Ziggs is just safer and can do it without standing in range the entire time

ziggs with lichbane late game kills tower with AA spell AA e
dead tower

Lategame Ziggs with lichbane can legitimately kill full health towers with a single auto attack.

No, no one else can do it THAT fast.  Except maybe Veigar or Nasus but even then they'd need more stacks than you'd realistically get in a game to match Ziggs.
me niether

> [{quoted}](name=DunkinNoobs,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=kVLrXde4,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-12-25T21:39:00.395+0000)
>
> Good at split pushing in what way, exactly? She's good at 1v1ing people, for sure. But taking towers?

She is good at tower killing because she has 2 auto attack resets in her kit, it's the same reason Vi and Jax are good at killing towers, they both have 1 or more auto attack resets in their kit. Add to that the fact that camille's extra damage on Q applies on towers and you have a tower-killing monster.

Mundo didnt lose an AA reset on turrets, they added a whole new reset to Mundo's E and decided that he didnt need MORE turret pressure on top of the AD Steroid it brings. Same deal when they reworked Illaoi's W to % HP and lowered the CD, now it only does the normal AA damage.

Trundle lost his because he could take your turret if you ever left lane thanks to his (at the time) extremely potent sustain and powerful AS steroid in W. Trundle meta was a dark time.

Camille has no wave clear (Her W is maxed last and does half damage to minions) and has no AS steroid to use on the turret, it just looks like she takes it fast because she does it in chunks through her Q + Sheen. 

Camille is OP for certain, but stripping away random mechanics for no good reason is not how champion balance works.
ur username (☉_☉)
This actually makes a lot of sense. Also, love the name! :p

Okay, I'm curious on why I see one original post about something new, and then a sudden flood of posts about the same exact thing instead of, I don't know, being posted in the first thread?

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/TQEL8q3E-camille-should-not-be-able-to-q-turrets

Do you not check the gameplay boards before posting in gameplay, or do you just not care? ~~Or do you wait to see if a thread got some upvotes so you want to get in on the upvote farm~~ Please don't bog down a board with the same content over and over, please

I actually never saw that post. This was something on my mind and I decided to post it. 

If you feel that something you can scroll past with zero consequences "bogs down a board" that's your problem, not mine.

You're not the first, and some waves are worse than others. There are times the same topic floods the front page.

I'm giving feedback, it's somewhat impolite to not even bother checking the board if you plan on sharing your thoughts. Shouldn't you be receptive to others, and look at what's going on around a board if you're going to be posting on that board? How do you expect others to care about your opinion if you don't care about others?
A post of your own tends to get more upvotes and attention than a comment hidden in someone else's post.

Good at splitpushing?

She **must** buy a Tiamat item to not lose the lane to minions.
pretty much this, her waveclear sucks and you're left rushing an early {{item:3077}}  delaying {{item:3078}}  by a whole 1100 gold or straight rush {{item:3078}} and prepare to lose a lot of minions
camille doesn't get a fat atk spd steroid or free AD, her Q is the only things that helps her splitting aside from trinity procs
Well, she does gets AA resets with very short CDs that happens to proc the Trinity Force.
What they need to do is reduce that true damage, that crap is ridiculous
It doesn't work on towers, though.
Nope, just does half of an adc's health with one move and she aint even an assassin

Good.
ADCs needs to be punished for being entilted animals that are meta for five consecutive ranked seasons.

PS. Food for thought: It's true for every Trinity force user.

Lol clearly someone has no idea how league ACTUALLY works.


PS. If you say "ps" in a comment you just look like an a** hole

>Lol clearly someone has no idea how league ACTUALLY works.
